properties.Name: ContractType
properties.Description:
A categorization of Contracts based upon common characteristics, attributes or functions served.

Ex:
- Sales
- Service
- Employment
- Lease 
- Equipment Lease
- Land Lease
- Mineral Lease
- Oil & Gas Lease
- Leasehold Interest
- Distributor
- Financial
- Security
- Utilities
- Royalty
- Royalty Deed
- Landowner's Royalty
- Tenure
- Turnkey
- Joint Operating Agreement
- Joint Venture Agreement
- Drilling
- Dry hole agreement
- Farmout

Columns.Name: ContractTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Contract Type.

Columns.Name: ContractTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of the Contract Type.

Columns.Name: ContractTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of the Contract Type.
